pro.created: A new Pro is created with identifier {{ param }}
pro.updated: A Pro is updated with identifier {{ param }}
pro.deleted: A Pro is deleted with identifier {{ param }}

delete.question: Are you sure you want to delete Pro {{ id }}?

pro.name: Name

summaryProfile.summaryBioMaxLength: Your summaryBio cannot be longer than 500 characters.
summaryProfile.successMessage:
You have taken the first step to becoming a Pro!
Your summary profile will be reviewed by other Pros with similar skills, and we will notify you within the next 1-2 days regarding your membership.
You can also check back anytime using your email.
summaryProfile.noticeMessage: Please check your email to activate your account!

detailProfile.successMessage:
You have taken the first step to becoming a ProStars Pro! Check your email
for verification steps

status.info: Please enter the information below to see Pro Applicant Status.
status.rejectMessage:
We are sorry to say that...
Unfortunately, this Pro application was not accepted at this time.
status.acceptMessage:
This user has been accepted to ProStars! An email had been sent to their email inbox to help them proceed.

Can't find your original acceptance email?
We'll be happy to resend it to you!
status.reviewMessage:
The application is currently being reviewed;
we will send the applicant an email once a decision has been made.
status.emailSentMessage: Email sent! Please check your email inbox!
status.emailSendingError: Oops! Something happened. We could not send the activation email.
status.isNotExist:
An application has not been submitted with this email!
Please apply and then re-check your status.
status.isExist: This email is already in use by a registered Pro!
status.isReferral:
This individual was referred,
but hasn't yet applied to ProStars.
status.alreadyExist: This email is already in use by a registered Pro!
status.toolTipRateRole: Enter your low and high hourly bill rates for each role

vetting.applicationsReport: Upon clicking this button, ProStars will automatically send an 'accepted' or 'rejected' communication to any Pro Applicant with a Status of 'Ready to Inform Applicant'.
